title: How to Kill Ivy Without Damaging a Tree

steps.headline: Check the base of the tree for suckers from the tree.
steps.description: If there are, do not even consider spraying as the tree will take up any poisons you spray. If there are none, and the tree has brown bark, spray glyphosate on the ivy that sits on the tree trunk.

steps.headline: Cut the ivy two weeks later.
steps.description: The lapse in time permits the glyphosate action to work on the entire ivy. Cut the vines as close to the ground as possible and cut out a section to prevent rebonding. Brush the glyphosate directly onto the cuts.

steps.headline: Allow natural die-off.
steps.description: Be aware that this will take around 1 - 2 years for the stems above the cut. Trying to remove the ivy will cause a lot of dust inhalation, and can damage the tree if the ivy has clung to it for quite a while. Over time the dead ivy will wither off. Overall natural rotting of the ivy can take 3 - 10 years.

steps.headline: Keep an eye on your handiwork.
steps.description: If the ivy sprouts up again anywhere, deal with it immediately by pulling it off.

text: Check the base of the tree for suckers from the tree. If there are, do not even consider spraying as the tree will take up any poisons you spray. If there are none, and the tree has brown bark, spray glyphosate on the ivy that sits on the tree trunk. Cut the ivy two weeks later. The lapse in time permits the glyphosate action to work on the entire ivy. Cut the vines as close to the ground as possible and cut out a section to prevent rebonding. Brush the glyphosate directly onto the cuts. Allow natural die-off. Be aware that this will take around 1 - 2 years for the stems above the cut. Trying to remove the ivy will cause a lot of dust inhalation, and can damage the tree if the ivy has clung to it for quite a while. Over time the dead ivy will wither off. Overall natural rotting of the ivy can take 3 - 10 years. Keep an eye on your handiwork. If the ivy sprouts up again anywhere, deal with it immediately by pulling it off.
